name: The Wanderer Rush
description:
The Wanderer Rush

Fight the Tree boss using your crossbow, sword and bombs, take advantage of the tree's weakness to fire with the bonfires  that surround him

Controls:

Right Click - move your character

Left Click - shoot crossbow

Q -  dash

W - use sword

E - throw bomb

game made for the Weekly Game Jam # 52 Theme : boss rush
